purpleculture_pinyin:
guì
cupboard; cabinet; wardrobe
буфет; шкаф; гардероб
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 柜)
Pictophonetic: 貴 indicates the sound; 木 (wood) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
櫃檯 [ guì tái ]: sales counter; front desk; bar; (of markets, medicines etc) OTC (over-the-counter)
櫃子 [ guì zi ]: cupboard; cabinet
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 木 [ mù ] tree; wood, lumber; wooden
    • ⿷ Surround from left
      • 匚 [ fāng ] box; basket
      • 貴 [ guì ] expensive, costly; valuable, precious
heisig_chinese_memo: A box made of a tree is a cupboard which can be really expensive depending on which tree it's made out of.
Ru_trainchinese:
guì: (графема) шкаф; касса (в магазине)
jǔ: (графема) (название вида дерева) клен усеченный
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you lack (匱) trees (木) to make a chest
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: In my cupboard I have a little model of a giant redwood tree.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " wood " and " causal ", the original meaning is small box, and then it refers to utensils used to hold clothes, books, documents, etc. "Han Feizi‧ Foreign Reserve Says Upper Left": "Chu people sell their pearls to Zheng. They are the cabinets of Mulan, with cassia peppers, jewels, roses, and jade.

A " cabinet " can refer to a place raised around to store water. "Southern Song Book" Volume 14: "A castle is built in every critical place, and if it is dangerous because of the water, the accumulation of water is a cabinet."

" Cabinet " can also mean counter or cabinet room. "Water Margin" Chapter 29: "The bartender went to the cabinet and told the woman to scoop down two corners of wine."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " wood " and " cai ", the original meaning is small box.
humanum_full_description:
從「木」，「匱」聲，本義為小匣，後泛指盛放衣物、書籍、文件等用的器具。《韓非子‧外儲說左上》：「楚人有賣其珠於鄭者，為木蘭之櫃，薰以桂椒，綴以珠玉，飾以玫瑰，輯以翡翠。」

　　「櫃」可指四周高起以蓄水的地方。《南宋書》卷14：「凡要害之地皆築城堡，其可因水為險者，皆積水為櫃。」

　　「櫃」也可表示櫃檯、櫃房。《水滸全傳》第29回：「那酒保去櫃上，叫那婦人舀兩角酒下來。」

從「 木 」，「 匱 」聲，本義為小匣，後泛指盛放衣物、書籍、文件等用的器具。《韓非子‧外儲說左上》：「楚人有賣其珠於鄭者，為木蘭之櫃，薰以桂椒，綴以珠玉，飾以玫瑰，輯以翡翠。」 「 櫃 」可指四周高起以蓄水的地方。《南宋書》卷14：「凡要害之地皆築城堡，其可因水為險者，皆積水為櫃。」 「 櫃 」也可表示櫃檯、櫃房。《水滸全傳》第29回：「那酒保去櫃上，叫那婦人舀兩角酒下來。」
From the sound of " wood" and " causal", the original meaning is small box, and then it refers to utensils used to hold clothes, books, documents, etc. "Han Feizi‧ Foreign Reserve Says Upper Left": "Chu people sell their pearls to Zheng. They are the cabinets of Mulan, with cassia peppers, jewels, roses, and jade. A " cabinet" can refer to a place raised around to store water. "Southern Song Book" Volume 14: "A castle is built in every critical place, and if it is dangerous because of the water, the accumulation of water is a cabinet." " Cabinet" can also mean counter or cabinet room. "Water Margin" Chapter 29: "The bartender went to the cabinet and told the woman to scoop down two corners of wine."

櫃字的基本解释

櫃
guì
见“柜1”。

櫃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guì］
［《廣韻》求位切，去至，羣。］
“匱2”的今字。“柜2”的繁体字。
(1)小匣。后泛指盛放衣物、书籍、文件等用的器具，方形或长方形，一般为木制或铁制。
(2)指四周高起以蓄水的地方。
(3)柜台；柜房。

櫃字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　櫃； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页559第12
【唐韻】求位切【正韻】具位切，?音餽。篋也。亦作匱。【書·金縢】納?于金縢之匱中。　又山名。【山海經】大荒之中有山，名曰北極天櫃。

櫃字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
櫃字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
cabinet
guì
See "Cabinet 1".
cabinet
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guì］
["Guangyun" Seek position, go to, group. ]
The present word for "Kai 2". Traditional characters of "柜2".
(1) Small box. The latter generally refers to utensils used for holding clothes, books, documents, etc., square or rectangular, generally made of wood or iron.
(2) Refers to a place raised around to store water.
(3) Counter; cabinet room.
cabinet
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　柜; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 559 No. 12
[Tang Yun] Seek position and cut [Zheng Yun] Position cut, sound feed.箧 also. Also for lack. [Book·Golden Dipper] To be included in the lack of gold?　Also the name of the mountain. [Shanhaijing] There are mountains in the great wilderness, called the Arctic Sky Ark.
